description.title: n8n
texts: n8n is an open-source workflow automation tool that enables users to connect various applications and services to automate tasks and processes. It provides a visual interface for designing workflows, allowing users to create complex automations without needing extensive coding knowledge. n8n supports a wide range of integrations with popular services like Google Sheets, Slack, and more, making it a versatile choice for automating repetitive tasks and improving productivity.
